title: Six-Star Opulence at the #1 Luxury Hotel in Vietnam
description: Experience unrivalled luxury in Vietnam’s Hồ Chí Minh City at The Reverie Saigon, Saigon's only six-star hotel. Oozing glamour at every turn, this palatial hotel - one of the Leading Hotels of the World and the #1 luxury hotel in Vietnam on TripAdvisor - showcases decadent, Italian-inspired style in the heart of the city’s District 1. Enjoy exclusive club lounge access with daily breakfasts, afternoon tea, nightly drinks and canapes and more.

vendor_name: Hotel Des Arts Saigon - MGallery Collection
title: Chic Art-Deco Inspired Ho Chi Minh City Indulgence with Three Restaurants, Rooftop Pool & Club
description:
Step into the yesteryear elegance of 1930s Vietnam at this chic five-star sanctuary, where French Indochine charm meets modern luxury in the heart of Ho Chi Minh City. Just a short stroll from Notre Dame Cathedral and Ben Thanh Market, this MGallery Collection hotel blends an artistic flair with world-class hospitality.

Soak up spectacular sunsets and skyline views from the rooftop infinity pool, sip cocktails at the stylish Social Club, or savour refined British fare at The Albion by Kirk Westaway. From the nostalgic charm of Café des Beaux-Arts to the vibrant flavours of Saigon Kitchen Restaurant, every moment here is a celebration of Vietnamese culture. After a day of exploration, retreat to the Le Spa des Artistes by L'Apothiquaire for restorative treatments.
location_description: Hôtel des Arts Saigon - MGallery Collection
offer_address: 76 78 Nguyen Thi Minh Khai Street, District 3, Hồ Chí Minh 070000, Vietnam
